column2: The Pilgrimage is not a religion, but rather an umbrella organization under which the major religions of humanity have placed themselves. As a new convert, or perhaps revert, you must choose one to embrace.
I believe in one God, the Father almighty, Maker of Heaven and Earth, and of all things visible and invisible. And in one Lord Jesus Christ...
I testify that there is no god but God, and I testify that Muhammad is the messenger of God.
The two largest faiths within the Pilgrimage are Christianity and Islam. You have decided to choose a new way, but which one shall it be?
This character is a Christian, proclaiming Jesus as Christ and the Son of God.
This character is a Muslim, upholding Mohammed as the last Prophet of God.
Which faith within the Pilgrimage do you support?
